lyrics:
4 contributorswhen i come home lyricsverse 1
i can hear my baby saying my name
but i dont see my baby in time
without you in here it aint the same
i didnt mean word i said to you last night

prechorus
if you decide to pick up the phone oh baby
ill be waiting for you
tell me whats wrong i didnt mean to ignore you
dont quit me baby i can fix it baby
being by myself is now my biggest fear

chorus
cause i want you here when i come back
there aint nothin i look more forward to than that
and i want you here when i come home
cause i cant stand to be alone you gotta be here
when i come back x4

verse 2
i can hear you telling to come home
but you may not even be there
we not gon make it if im always gone
plus you told me you aint going anywhere
see tpain liveget tickets as low as 57you might also likeprechorus
if you decide to pick up the phone oh baby
ill be waiting for you
tell me whats wrong i didnt mean to ignore you
dont quit me baby i can fix it baby
being by myself is now my biggest fear

chorus
cause i want you here when i come back
there aint nothin i look more forward to than that
and i want you here when i come home
cause i cant stand to be alone you gotta be here
when i come back x4embed
